question: Who is the author of the book “Trust Exercise”?
explanation: Susan Choi has won the fiction prize at the National Book Awards in New York. The National Book Awards, now in its 70th year, was established in 1950, but has existed in its current iteration since 1989. Previous winners include Colson Whitehead (2016, The Underground Railroad); Jonathan Franzen (2001, The Corrections); Louise Erdrich (2012, The Round House).Winners of each category are awarded $10,000, while finalists take home $1,000.
